newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Micro raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Advanced Micro raised.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said analyst Erika Klauer upgraded Advanced Micro Devices Inc to strong buy from hold.
-- Raised 1997 earnings per share estimate to $1.50 from $0.20 and 1998 to $3.50 from $1.00.
-- Among reasons, said AMD's K6 microprocessor is "ready to go with compatibility testing no longer an issue."
-- Cited strong flash memory business conditions and improving programmable logic device business.
-- Said stock has upside potential to $50-$55 by year end.
